item.title: Ford Issues Massive Recall Of Over 680,000 Vehicles Across Multiple Models: Here's What You Should Know
item.description: Ford issues recalls for more than 680,000 vehicles in U.S. due to seatbelt, engine, and camera issues amidst technician shortage. read more

item.description: U.S. stock futures slumped on Friday following Thursday’s declines. Futures of major benchmark indices dropped by nearly 1%. read more

item.description: Stellantis partners with Pony AI to develop and test self-driving vehicles in Europe. Collaboration aims to launch hands-free cars by 2026. read more
